NAME:
   getenvoy - Download and run Envoy

USAGE:
   getenvoy [global options] command [command options] [arguments...]

VERSION:
   dev

COMMANDS:
   run       Run Envoy as <version> with <args> as arguments, collecting process state on termination
   versions  List available Envoy versions
   install   Download and install a <version> of Envoy

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --home-dir value  GetEnvoy home directory (location of downloaded artifacts, caches, etc) (default: ${HOME}/.getenvoy) [$GETENVOY_HOME]
   --help, -h        show help (default: false)
   --version, -v     print the version (default: false)
